data.title: Bryan ISD
data.text:
Our Programs

Our programs are designed to give you peace of mind when your child is not in school. Experienced, caring, and licensed staff ensures your child is safe, engaged, and happy! Every student participates in enrichment activities every day, at no additional charge! Coding, Robotics, Art, Drama, Spanish, Mandarin, Sign Language, Fitness & Sports, and Engineering/Maker Activities keep your child engaged and having fun every day at AlphaBEST! Snacks, homework help, recreation, and student-choice clubs are also provided to every student.

Meet Your Assistant Area Manager

Howdy! My name is Eunice Jones. I have been with AlphaBEST since 2019. My number one goal is to provide a safe, healthy, and diverting environment for each child. Working with many different families has taught me a lot throughout my time in the afterschool program. My greatest achievement was accepting this position as an Assistant Area Manager. I will do everything to serve each student and family to the best of my ability. I will give my BEST every day to create and connect our community.

Meet Your District Manager

Hello! My name is Karimah Rhodes-Hopkins also known as Mrs. Teelah. I have been part of Bryan ISD AlphaBEST After School Programs for 10 of my 18 years in the field of childcare. I enjoy being there for Bryan ISD families and love to see our students smile and enjoy themselves each day. In my spare time, I enjoy spending time with my family. We love cooking and playing family games together. "Every job is a self-portrait of the person who did it. I'm going to autograph my work with excellence every day!"

Frequently Asked Questions
